Package org.apache.juneau.serializer.annotation

package org.apache.juneau.serializer.annotation
Serializer Annotations
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.apache.juneau.serializer
    Serializer API
  • Class
    Description
    SerializerConfig
    Annotation for specifying config properties defined in Serializer, OutputStreamSerializer, and WriterSerializer.
    SerializerConfigAnnotation
    Utility classes and methods for the @SerializerConfig annotation.
    SerializerConfigAnnotation.OutputStreamSerializerApply
    Applies SerializerConfig annotations to a OutputStreamSerializer.Builder.
    SerializerConfigAnnotation.SerializerApply
    Applies SerializerConfig annotations to a Serializer.Builder.
    SerializerConfigAnnotation.WriterSerializerApply
    Applies SerializerConfig annotations to a WriterSerializer.Builder.
